## srgbLinear variable

Maps a single linear sRGB channel value to linear RGB.

[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/SRGB](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/SRGB)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
srgbLinear: (x: number) => number
```
